topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: OpenHotmail
short_description:
OpenHotmail is a Project that aims to document the HTTP Protocol used to access windows live hotmail.

OpenHotmail also intends to release libraries to make writing of applications that access hotmail very easy.
